meanings.definition: The act or practice of describing or depicting heraldic devices.
meanings.sent1: The blazonry of the shield showed a lion and a crown.
meanings.sent2: The castle was adorned with intricate blazonry depicting the family's history.
meanings.sent3: The artist's exaggerated blazonry of the dragon made it look like a friendly pet.
meanings.sent4: The blazonry on the flag seemed to dance in the wind, telling tales of old battles.
meanings.sent5: The blazonry on the tapestry was so detailed that every thread seemed to come alive.
